<style>
/* Masonry grid with 3 columns */
#masonry-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
  grid-gap: 15px;
  grid-auto-rows: 1px; /* Changed to 1px for finer control */
}

.masonry-item {
  width: 100%;
  border-radius: 0;
  transition: transform 0.2s;
}

/* Optional hover effect */
.masonry-item:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
}
</style>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const grid = document.getElementById('masonry-grid');
  if (!grid) return;

  // Function to calculate and set row spans
  function layoutMasonry() {
    const items = grid.querySelectorAll('.masonry-item');
    const rowHeight = 1; // Must match grid-auto-rows in CSS
    
    items.forEach(item => {
      // Reset height to get accurate measurement
      item.style.height = 'auto';
      
      // Calculate row span
      const itemHeight = item.getBoundingClientRect().height;
      const rowSpan = Math.ceil(itemHeight / rowHeight) + 1; // Added buffer
      
      // Apply row span
      item.style.gridRowEnd = `span ${rowSpan}`;
    });
  }

  // Initial layout
  layoutMasonry();

  // Relayout when images load
  const images = grid.querySelectorAll('img');
  images.forEach(img => {
    if (img.complete) {
      layoutMasonry();
    } else {
      img.addEventListener('load', layoutMasonry);
    }
  });

  // Optional: Handle window resize
  window.addEventListener('resize', layoutMasonry);
});
</script>
